title: Concurrent validation of the resistance intensity scale for exercise for monitoring velocity-based training with elastic bands
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Juan C. Colado, Javier Gene-Morales, Pablo Jiménez-Martínez, Angel Saez-Berlanga, Ana María Ferri-Caruana, Amador Garcia-Ramos, Jorge Flandez, Carlos Babiloni-Lopez
